originalText.text: I’m so glad I was able to connect with Courtney! She is extremely knowledgeable and helped answer all my questions. She is very friendly and made me feel super comfortable throughout the whole process. I highly recommend Courtney for any of your real estate needs. There’s no one better!

text.text: I’m so glad I was able to connect with Courtney! She is extremely knowledgeable and helped answer all my questions. She is very friendly and made me feel super comfortable throughout the whole process. I highly recommend Courtney for any of your real estate needs. There’s no one better!

originalText.text: Talia is hands down the best broker in NYC. I worked with her and her team on our last two apartments and she is so genuine and warm it’s like collaborating with a friend. She understands exactly what you’re looking for and is so professional in her searches, reports and recommendations. Talia has great connections, relationships and a stellar reputation, and will go the extra mile in her negotiations to secure the apartment. She knows the market and loves what she does, which is evident in how available she is, around the clock, never stopping until she has found your dream home, no matter your budget. Her smile could also light up a room. In a city full of second rate brokers she is the real deal. I can’t recommend her highly enough and will enlist her talent every time. Thank you Talia.

originalText.text: Talia is by far the best, most personable realtor you can find. She helped my husband and I both buy and sell our apartment in NYC. Communication was flawless. Overall the whole process was enjoyable. Highly recommend

originalText.text: Courtney Mendez is amazing! She helped my partner and I find a home with such ease. She is so patient, professional, and understanding! She has made this process so painless, and I'm grateful for her helping us with this process. I highly recommend her, as she is someone who will go over and beyond to find the perfect home for you! She will not steer you wrong!!

text.text: Courtney Mendez is amazing! She helped my partner and I find a home with such ease. She is so patient, professional, and understanding! She has made this process so painless, and I'm grateful for her helping us with this process. I highly recommend her, as she is someone who will go over and beyond to find the perfect home for you! She will not steer you wrong!!

originalText.text: Having a real estate agent who knows the area is important. Courtney was very knowledgeable about the neighborhood and what to look for when evaluating a house. She is also friendly and helpful. Her promptness, knowledge of the market, strategic mindset, kindness, good energy made what can be a stressful process simple. I’ve already recommended her to two of my good friends. When I am looking to buy again I will not hesitate to call Courtney Mendez!
